1.text: I refresh Twitter as thoughtlessly as some twirl their hair.
1.name: Lena Dunham

2.text: I am not a good terrified person.
2.name: Stevie Nicks

3.text: There ain't nothin' more dangerous in this world than a fool with a cause...
3.name: Matthew McConaughey

4.text: I was under the false impression that I could sing in high school, so I did a lot of musical stuff.
4.name: Rachel Brosnahan

5.text: I volunteer! - I gasp. I volunteer as tribute!
5.name: Jennifer Lawrence

6.text: I got sunshine in my pocket.
6.name: Justin Timberlake
